svg.text: And where can you see it?
YOU PICK THE CHARITY, WE SEND THE MONEY

text.tspan: A single Good-loop ad can support up to 3 charities.
When there is more than one charity displayed,
you get to choose which one gets the money.
Advertisers/brands pay for the donations. Why?
Because in exchange they get a much higher ad engagement
and increase in positive brand sentiment.
Whenever you see our logo we guarantee that 50%
of the cost of the ad is donated to support good causes.

svg.text: BUT IT ALL DEPENDS ON YOU

text.tspan: The 50% of the ad money is split between
the charities according to the number of votes
they get from you, the ad view.er

svg.text: YOU CAN SEE THESE ON WEBSITES

text.tspan: Our ads convert ad money into free charity donations,
whilst delivering higher ad performance for the brands.
The money we generate supports amazing causes
on a large scale all around the world.
